messages.subject: HSC tapes and how to get them
messages.msgSnippet: This was specifically about the Peaceful Parenting tape, but there are others here too. And don t let this keep you from ordering from Kelly s SC tapes when
messages.messageBody:
This was specifically about the Peaceful Parenting tape, but there are others
here too.
And don't let this keep you from ordering from Kelly's SC tapes when those
are ready!

<< how do we get the tape you spoke about? what is the cost? >>

You can order it from Happy Harry who copies the tapes for HSC
or you can order it from me, when I get the stuff I left in SC, which will be
a few days from now. There were things both at Kelly's house and that marty
had in the room when he checked out Tuesday that needed to be packed and
sent. Poor KELLY! Tons of stuff to go through.

But anyway,
I have permission to order copies of my own tapes from the distributor to
sell.

From me, $6 a tape and $1 for mailing per tape
I have three of those listed below plus two from the 2001 conference, mine on
Unschooling Gloriously Introduced, and one of me and Richard Prystowsky
called "To Question or Not to Question--that is the question."

2905 Tahiti Ct. NE
Albuquerque NM 87112

From Harry you'll need the tape's number, too, and that's the letter and
number after each item, below:

Tapes $6.00 each Ca. Res. Add Sales Tax 8.25%
Shipping will be $1.75 1-2 tapes, 3-6 $3.25, 7-15 $ 3.75
Please Allow 2 Weeks for DELIVERY
WRITE, CALL or Email:
Send Check or Money Order to:
T C C Audio Tapes, 578 Meadowlark St.,
Livermore, CA 94551 PH./ FAX 925 449 8402
Email tapeguy@...
www.tccaudio.com
